dict.acceptation: 奖金，额外津贴；红利，额外股息；退职金；额外令人高兴的事情；

sent.orig: Bonus distribution month can be set up beforehand, such as quarterly bonus and annual bonus.
sent.trans: 可预先设定各类奖金发放月份，如季度奖、年终奖等。

sent.orig: Mill gives 5% bonus every 2 weeks and school gives 1 point bonus every week.
sent.trans: 轧机提供5％的奖金，每2周和学校提供1点奖金每周。

sent.orig: Bonus is converted having a premise is share out bonus of this fund implementation.
sent.trans: 红利转投有一个前提就是该基金实现分红。

sent.orig: Bonus share: A share given as a Bonus to purchasers of shares.
sent.trans: 红利股：作为红利赠送给股票购买者的股票。

sent.orig: We don't bonus every month, but we offer a semi-annual bonus.
sent.trans: 我们不发月度奖金，每半年发一次奖金。
